posts.text:
Architecture 
System board / Form factor 
•Ultra-small desktop (1x2) with Intel 915GV chipset 
•Supports Intel Prescott Celeron D processor with 533MHZ FSB and 256KB L2 cache 
•Supports Intel Prescott Pentium 4 processors with 533MHz or 800MHz FSB and 1MB or 2MB L2 cache 
•LGA 775 socket 
 
Processor 
•Intel® Celeron® D Processor 326 
•Intel® Celeron® D Processor 336 
•Intel® Celeron® D Processor 346 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 505 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 515 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 531 with HT Technology 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 541 with HT Technology 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 551 with HT Technology 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 630 with HT Technology 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 640 with HT Technology 
•Intel® Pentium® 4 Processor 650 with HT Technology 
 
Cache 
•256KB cache - Celeron processors 
•1MB cache - Pentium 4 processors 
•2MB cache - Pentium 4 processors 
 
Chipsets 
•Intel 915G or 915GV chipset 
•Integrated Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 900 
•I/O Controller Hub (ICH6) 
•AC '97 2.3 Digital controller 
 
IDE controller 
•Supports up to two IDE devices, a combination of one serial ATA and one parallel ATA, or two parallel ATA-100 devices 
 
Memory 
•400MHz DDR2 (Double Data Rate) dual channel memory support 
•PC2-4200 (400MHz) memory supported 
•2 240 pin DDR2 SDRAM DIMM sockets 
•Supports a maximum memory up to 4.0GB 
•ECC or parity memory is not supported 
 
Audio 
•SoundMAX Cadenza with SPX 
•Integrated PCI AC'97 2.3 compliant CODEC 
•ADI 1888 CODEC 
•Front - Microphone-in, Headphones out 
•Rear - Line-in, line-out, and microphone input 
•Jack sensing, jack retasking - software will automatically detect which jack the microphone is using. 
•Mono microphone output 
•Software-based audio (done by processor and ICH8) 
•External stereo speakers (select models) 
 
Keyboard and mouse 
•Preferred Pro full-size keyboard 
•Fingerprint Reader keyboard (selected models) 
•Enhanced Performance keyboard (select models) 
•USB Optical Wheel mouse 
 
communications 
Networking 
•Integrated 10/100/1000 (Gigabit) Ethernet with Wake on LAN 
 
Expansion 
Bays 
•One fixed Ultrabay Enhanced optical drive (accessible) 
•One 3.5-inch HDD (hidden) 
 
External ports 
•Six USB ( two in front, four in back) [Ver 2.0] 
•One Ethernet RJ-45 
•One serial 9-pin 16550 compatible 
•One parallel 25-pin (EPP, ECP), IEEE 1284 
•Keyboard, monitor, and mouse ports 
•Audio line in, headphone out, and microphone in jacks 
 
Slots 
•Slot 1: Full height, half length PCI 
 
http://imageshack.us/f/703/ibm8106.jpg/
verð 15.000kr

koma kanski með aðeins betri og nákvæmari upplýsingar um hvaða vélbúnaður er í þessari vél?
þe hvernig örgjörvi, hvernig harður diskur er í vélinni?

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/838/img0532bn.jpg/
hún er með Pentium D (socket 775) 3.2GHz örgjörva og 1GB ddr2 vinsluminni, slim DVD-rom, en engum hörðum disk.
Samkvæmt myndinni er þetta Pentium 4 en ekki Pentium D
